title: Jonathan Klein
description:
This week TST contributor Jonathon Klein (@Jonathon_Klein) is in town for the LA Auto Show and he joins us for our pre-Thanksgiving episode. Fresh off testing a BMW 1M w/ a V8 we sit down for a discussion that encompasses, Coachella Gypsy Cabs, minivan crash testing, Honda's quality issues, IROC-Z track cars, the uniform mediocrity of most modern V6s, Passat W8s, Jonathon gives us his take on the new Mustang Ecoboost vs GT,  we talk about possible Fiesta ST suspension changes, C6 Grand Sport track cars and we cover some of the highlights of the LA Auto Show including...

  • Mustang GT350
  • Mercedes AMG GT
  • Cadillac ATS-V
  • Fisker/Galpin Mustang Rocket
  • Chevy ZR2 Pickup 
  • Volkswagen Golf R
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
